title: What are some examples of communication devices? - Quora

response.answer_text: A communication device is a hardware device having the ability to transmit analog or digital signals over a communication wire or wirelessly. A computer modem is one of the best examples of a communication device. WiFi, NIC(network interface card)- are some typical examples of communication devices. Bluetooth device, Infrared device, Smartphone- are different kinds of communication devices that a user may encounter when dealing with a computer. Without a communication device, a computer can work fine. But for a computer to do communication with other computers, they require a communication device.

Anyting that can be attached to the following: Is it an animate object that connects two people or more together. Meaning a stone can be a communication device when throwin a stone at a friend shows that you want them to react to you. Moving into the modern age, laptops, smart tvs, satelite decoders and smartphones as well as landlines, postoffice all can fall under communication devices.
